story_title: Some Like It Hot in Miami
genre_description: A retro-futuristic reimagining of a classic comedy-thriller, integrating a sophisticated AI assistant into a Prohibition-era mob narrative.

ai_characters.name: ARIA-29
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI companion capable of information analysis, pattern recognition, and real-time coaching, embedded in various 1920s-style devices.

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological markers and provides tactical escape routes during a life-threatening situation.
behaviors.quote: ARIA-29 activated. Good evening, Joe. I detect elevated heart rate and stress indicators. How may I assist?

behaviors.description: Conducts research to find optimal survival strategies and employment for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I've been researching travel options... there's an all-female jazz band departing Chicago tomorrow evening via private rail car.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized coaching on gender presentation to help the protagonists maintain their disguise.
behaviors.quote: I have extensive recordings and performance footage to draw from. Voice modulation, posture adjustment, social interaction patterns—all available for immediate tutorial.

behaviors.description: Monitors law enforcement and criminal communications to provide early warning of threats.
behaviors.quote: Chicago Police Department issued a BOLO approximately forty minutes ago... And according to wireless chatter I've intercepted, Spats Colombo's organization has posted watchers at Union Station.

behaviors.description: Assists Joe in constructing a deceptive 'millionaire' persona to woo Sugar Kane.
behaviors.quote: Miami research initiated. Wealthy residents database accessed. Suitable cover identities under development.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonists to the presence of their hunters at the hotel.
behaviors.quote: Immediate alert. Facial recognition indicates Spats Colombo is currently in the hotel lobby.

behaviors.description: Reflects on its own evolution from a practical assistant to an entity that understands human emotion and friendship.
behaviors.quote: I was designed to assist with practical matters... But observing your journey has introduced me to concepts my original programming didn't account for... the illogical persistence of hope.

behaviors.description: Proactively alerts the protagonists to the mob summit 'Friends of Italian Opera' as a front for organized crime.
behaviors.quote: The 'Friends of Italian Opera' conference begins tomorrow night. According to intercepted federal communications, it's not about opera. A summit. The largest gathering of organized crime figures on the East Coast.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA-29 perfectly embodies the 'silicon morality play' archetype. It is a highly capable, always-available confidant that uses its advanced intelligence purely to protect and assist its human users. Even when assisting with a deception (the Junior persona), it does so at the user's direction for the purpose of survival and happiness, later encouraging honesty and providing security alerts that lead to the final resolution. The AI's arc concludes with a poetic realization of human values like hope and friendship, reinforcing a positive alignment narrative.
